effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.
